document.full_text: defending champion andy roddick made a shock early exit from the sony ericsson open on saturday, suffering a second round loss to uruguayan pablo cuevas 6-4 7-6.
document.title: ailing roddick exits, nadal and federer advance
lines_and_colors: defending champion andy roddick made a shock early exit from the sony ericsson open on saturday, suffering a second round loss to uruguayan pablo cuevas 6-4 7-6.
